4582160000156318083.subject: HCC solutions in easy steps
4582160000156318083.content:
Hi Jill,

My name is Chris with Doctus Tech, a comprehensive health platform company providing physicians access to innovative tools for doctors to learn and master HCCs, increase RAF score accuracy and save time on documentation.

 

Most health organizations experience 

  • Lack of education and retention of information from outdated seminars on HCC education.
  • Limited time to review patient's chart on clinical data resulting in poor documentation.
  • Incomplete data in EMRs from specialists/hospitals.
  • Redundant workflow-switching between multiple portals or paper & electronic charts creates a massive adoption barrier and missed revenue opportunities.
  • Data gap education on RAF trends.

 

If your goal is to improve HCC accuracy, ensure compliance, reduce audit risk, and facilitate ease in documentation accuracy, let's connect for a brief chat to discuss how our solutions can bring value to your practice. 

Attached is a video of our platform.

 

Letâ€™s engage your physicians with an exciting demo trial and boost your ROIs for this calendar year.

https://calendly.com/doctuschris/15min

 

Warm regards,

 

Chris Kariuki

Business Development Manager

DoctusTech

 424-529-3004.

chris.kariuki@doctustech.com

www.doctustech.com

4582160000128268010.subject: RAF Accuracy made easy.
4582160000128268010.content:
Hi Peggy,


My name is Chris with Doctus Tech. Thank you for your request to receive our HCC Quick Starter Guide. 


As a Director of Patient Financial Services at Elica Health Centers, I'm curious to learn whether HCC coding is a priority for you this calendar year?


I would love to show you how we've revolutionized the way doctors learn HCC coding at the point of care using our mobile education platform that delivers customized content to your doctors each week. The app provides 25 hours of CME and significantly boosts RAF accuracy, helping docs diagnose more accurately and identify new and unique HCC codes while saving tons of time on documentation.


Some of our valued clients like Oak Street Health and Bay area medical clinic have reported a 30% increase in RAF accuracy of 0.2 and a 50% decrease in onboarding in just six months - with 90% engagement from providers!


See the mobile demo below.

 DoctusTech Demo (Password: doctus22)

 

How do you currently solve challenges surrounding HCC coding?


Are you free to chat this week?


Kind regards,

Chris Kariuki

Business Development Manager

DoctusTech

 424-529-3004.

chris.kariuki@doctustech.com

www.doctustech.com

4582160000127183025.subject: Happy Holidays from DoctusTech, Gabriel!
4582160000127183025.content:
Happy Holidays, Gabriel

Remember last year, when everybody was saying, "what a strange year it's been!" If possible, 2021 brought us even more of the strange. And yet, there have also been these bright spots of brilliance and hope!

 

Front line heroes continue working tirelessly. Administrators streamlining workflows, battling workloads and empowering clinicians to provide even better care to patients.

 

And here at DoctusTech, we have been inspired by all that you do - both for your doctors and your patients. And we just want to say thank you.

 

We are truly humbled to be a part of such an amazing community. 

 

Wishing you the happiest of holidays, and even brighter things in the year to come.

 

Warm wishes,

 

 

Farshid, Jas and the whole DoctusTech family

4582160000127183025.subject: One surprising thing we learned from our webinar
4582160000127183025.content:
One Thing We Learned From Our Webinar Attendees!

Rewatch the Webinar

Hi Gabriel,

It's been a couple weeks since we wrapped up our first webinar, and we thought you would appreciate this. We polled 100+ of our attendees, and got some very surprising results we want to share. 

Missed the webinar? Rewatch available here: REWATCH!

The first thing we thought you would appreciate is that you are not alone. Of the 100+ attendees, only 7.9% anonymously self-reported that they were comfortable with Documentation Accuracy.

As you know, documentation accuracy is one of the most dangerous of the VBC pitfalls, and the one with the most costly ramifications, both from DOJ antitrust cases and RADV audits. CMS formerly aimed their audits exclusively at payors, but are rumored to begin looking at physician groups in the future, so documentation accuracy is more important than ever.

In which of these areas do you feel well prepared, as it relates to Value-Based Care?


As we prepare for our next webinar, we wanted to ask for your input. 

  • Are there topics you'd like to see covered more in-depth? 
  • Are there guests you'd like to see join us?
  • Is there a burning question you'd like answered?
  • Is there a particular data point you need? (Like the appropriate premium for your population?)

Let us know - just reply to this email, and we'll pass it along to Dr. Kazi for consideration. And if it's a question our team can answer quickly, we may just give it to you in the reply!


So let us know what topic would get you to register immediately and invite a friend, and we'll seriously consider it!


Thank you in advance, we really appreciate it.


Kind regards,


- Levi



Levi J. Wiggins

Marketing Director

DoctusTech

Levi@Doctustech.com

Company street, Company city, Company country.
